info.description: Common Login Service 提供用户认证、注册、登录等功能的 API 服务
info.title: Common Login Service API

get.description: Get all API tokens

post.description: Create a new API token for external access

put.description: Enable or disable an API token

get.description: Get balance logs with pagination and optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by type (admin, api, gift_card, purchase_vip, payment)
parameters.name: type

get.description: Get all gift cards with pagination

post.description: Create one or multiple gift cards
Delete multiple gift cards by IDs

get.description: Get all unused gift cards for export

post.description: Authenticate admin user

get.description: Get login logs with pagination and optional filters
Get current system settings
Get current registration and login access settings

put.description: Update registration and login access settings

get.description: Get custom HTML/CSS and footer configuration

put.description: Update custom HTML/CSS and footer configuration
Update Gmail API configuration for sending emails

get.description: Get current login protection configuration
Get current payment gateway configuration
Get profile page navigation configuration
Get current site configuration
Get all VIP level configurations
Get users with pagination and optional search by username, email, or display name

post.description: Create a new user with specific parameters via admin panel

get.description: Get a specific user's information by their ID

put.description: Set user's balance to a specific value

post.description: Add or subtract from user's balance
Force logout a user by deleting all their active sessions
Reset user's password to a new random password

put.description: Enable or disable a user account
Set user's VIP expiration time. Use empty string to clear expiration (permanent VIP).

post.description: Receive asynchronous payment notification from PyPay payment system

get.description: Get current user's balance and VIP level

post.description: Change the current authenticated user's password

get.description: Redirect to Discord OAuth for binding to existing account
Handle Discord OAuth callback for binding to existing account

302.description: Redirect to profile page with error

get.description: Handle Discord OAuth callback after user authentication

302.description: Redirect to login page with error

get.description: Redirect to Discord OAuth login page

post.description: Login with Discord using access token from frontend SDK
Initiate password reset by sending a reset email

get.description: Redirect to Google OAuth for binding to existing account
Handle Google OAuth callback for binding to existing account

302.description: Redirect to profile page with error

get.description: Handle Google OAuth callback after user authentication

302.description: Redirect to login page with error

get.description: Redirect to Google OAuth login page

post.description: Login with Google using ID token from frontend SDK

get.description: Check if Google OAuth is enabled and get client ID

post.description: Authenticate a user with email and password
Log out the current user by clearing the token cookie and invalidating the session
Preview a gift card to see its contents and check for VIP conflicts before redeeming

get.description: Get the current authenticated user's profile

put.description: Update the current authenticated user's profile (display name, avatar)

post.description: Purchase VIP membership using account balance. Supports upgrade from lower VIP levels with discounted prices.
Redeem a gift card to add balance and/or VIP membership to account. If the gift card contains VIP and the user already has an active VIP, confirmation is required.
Register a new user with email, username and password
Reset user password using the reset token from email
Send a verification email to the authenticated user. Rate limited to 1 email per 60 seconds.
Generate a callback URL with HMAC-signed user data (UID, VIP level, balance, etc.)

get.description: Check if signed URL callback feature is enabled
Redirect to Steam OpenID for binding to existing account
Handle Steam OpenID callback for binding to existing account

302.description: Redirect to profile page with error

get.description: Handle Steam OpenID callback after user authentication

302.description: Redirect to login page with error

get.description: Redirect to Steam OpenID login page
Get the binding status of Google, Steam, and Discord accounts

post.description: Unbind Discord account from the current user
Unbind Google account from the current user
Unbind Steam account from the current user
Validate a JWT token and return user info

get.description: Verify email using the token from the verification email

post.description: Verify the HMAC signature of user data received from callback
Generate a new captcha challenge

get.description: Check if captcha is enabled

post.description: Verify the captcha answer

get.description: Get custom HTML/CSS and footer configuration for frontend display

post.description: Update a user's balance using API token authentication
Set a user's password using API token authentication. Requires 'password' or 'all' permission.

get.description: Get a user's information using API token authentication

post.description: Create a new user with specific parameters using API token authentication. Requires 'user' or 'all' permission.
Set a user's VIP expiration time using API token authentication. Requires 'vip' or 'all' permission.
post.summary: Set user VIP expiration time (API Token)

post.description: Set a user's VIP level using API token authentication

get.description: Get the user's current language preference

post.description: Set the user's preferred language (stored in cookie)
Create a payment order and get PyPay redirect URL

get.description: Check if payment is enabled and in demo mode
Get profile navigation configuration for frontend display
Get site configuration for frontend display
Get VIP level configurations for frontend display

registration_start_uid.description: Minimum UID for backend registration (0 = no restriction)

vip_level.description: VIP level to grant (0 = no VIP, balance only)

duration.description: Optional: specific duration to purchase (for multiple specifications). If not provided, uses default price/duration.

confirm.description: Set to true to confirm redemption when VIP conflict exists
